title: âœ¨ Ordo.pink v0.7.0
message: The editor got more convenient! I hope. You can now trigger quick access menu by typing /. New editor components added, including callouts, table of content, labels and file links (both with autosuggestions).

title: âœ¨ Ordo.pink v0.6.0
message: We added achievements! You'll get one as soon as you sign in - for joining during beta. You can see the achievements on the account page. A few bugs fixed, a few new bugs incorporated.
